DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect four different pre-workout beverage compare placebo muscular strength endurance , perceive energy cognitive performance healthy adult male .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males , age 18 40 year 2 . Subject waist circumference ≤ 97 cm . 3 . Subject nonsmoker . 4 . Subject good health appropriate exercise determine physical examination , medical history ECG . 5 . Subject weight train 6 month prior start trial . 6 . Subject agrees use new vitamin and/or mineral study completion take vitamin and/or mineral 24 hour prior test visit . 7 . Subject agree use dietary herbal supplement study completion . A 7day washout allow study inclusion . 8 . Subject willing able comply protocol include : Attending 5 visit approximately 4 hour long ; Refraining caffeine , overthecounter medication alcohol 24 hour prior test visit ; Refraining weight train 48 hour prior refrain exercise weight train 24 hour prior test visit ; Refraining take dietary herbal supplement throughout study . 9 . Subject able understand sign inform consent participate study . 1 . Subject follow medical condition : active heart disease uncontrolled high blood pressure ( ≥ 140/90 mmHg ) renal hepatic impairment/disease Type I II diabetes bipolar disorder pulmonary disease ( include current asthma ) Parkinson 's disease Seizure disorder unstable thyroid disease immune disorder ( HIV/AIDS ) active psychiatric disorder ( include anxiety disorder ) bleed disorder gastrointestinal ulcer disease medical condition deem exclusionary Principal Investigator ( PI ) 2 . Subject orthopedic problem ( ) history musculoskeletal injury ( y ) make ( ) resistance weight training contraindicate . 3 . Subject history cancer ( except localize skin cancer without metastasis ) within 5 year prior screen . 4 . No prescription chronic medication use allow without PI discretion . 5 . Subject currently take unwilling refrain take overthecounter stimulant medications/supplements ( see section 2.6.2 ) ; sevenday washout require study inclusion . 6 . Subject currently take unwilling refrain take overthecounter allergy asthma medication contain pseudoephedrine ephedrine ( see section 2.6.2 ) ; sevenday washout require study inclusion . 7 . Subject allergy milk phenylalanine , ingredient test product ( see section 3.2.1 ) . 8 . Subject report sensitivity caffeine and/or betaalanine . 9 . Subject report regular caffeine consumer define consume > 600 mg caffeine per day . 10 . Subject exhibit evidence hepatic renal dysfunction evidence ALT , AST , AP ≥ two time upper limit normal serum creatinine value ≥ 2.0 mg/dl clinically significant abnormal clinical laboratory value per PI discretion . 11 . Subject clinically relevant abnormality define PI interpret physician respect ECG . 12 . Subject QTcB interval > 450 msec . 13 . Subject history drug alcohol abuse past 12 month . 14 . Subject condition abnormality , opinion investigator , would compromise safety subject quality study data . 15 . Subject take investigational product within 30 day first exercise test visit ( visit 2 ) .
